title: Duramo 10 Shoes
subtitle: Kids Running
description:
If your kids seem to be running a little faster these days, they might be. The LIGHTMOTION midsole in these shoes adds superlight cushioning that helps them scurry in a hurry. A molded heel piece provides support for all-day play. Layered designs on the upper add a bit of big-kid flash.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Dash Grey / Beam Pink / Bliss Lilac

title: Gamemode Turf Soccer Shoes
subtitle: Soccer
description: Make your choice. Find your voice. With two styles and a range of designs, adidas Gamemode is serious about self-expression. Created with a comfortable fit for a wide range of foot shapes, these soccer shoes offer a cushioned touch thanks to their soft HybridTouch upper. Underneath, a lug rubber outsole helps you express yourself on artificial turf. The graphics take their eye-catching inspiration from LEGO® bricks.
colors: Cloud White / Carbon / Bright Blue

title: NMD_V3 Shoes
subtitle: Women's Originals
description:
The future is now. The original running-inspired style that made you love the adidas NMD_V3 shoes get a new look by combining tactical technology with elevated style. Metallic overlays and semi-translucent TPU add a glossy, futuristic finish. Long commutes and slick city sidewalks are no problem, thanks to the BOOST cushioning and grippy rubber outsole beneath your feet.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
colors: Purple / Purple / Grey Two

title: Superstar Shoes
subtitle: Youth Originals
description:
You know the magical feeling of seeing a rainbow after a storm. So why not bring that magic into every step? These juniors' shoes are a whimsical spin on the classic adidas Superstar trainer. Faded iridescent underlays provide an eye-catching pattern and inspire you to live colorfully. A snug fit with an OrthoLite® sockliner ensures that comfort isn't sacrificed for style. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

title: ZNCHILL LIGHTMOTION+ Lifestyle Adult Shoe
subtitle: Men's Sportswear
description:
Just another example of adidas' sneaker genius. These 3-Stripes are set on top of a LIGHTMOTION midsole for comfy cushioning. A chunky rubber outsole adds grip when you're moving between slick and rough surfaces. There's no change of shoe needed, even with a busy schedule. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Bright Red

title: adidas x Disney Vulc Raid3r Muppets Slip-On Shoes
subtitle: Children Essentials
description:
Light enough to wear on sunny days with plenty of support for growing feet. These kids' adidas skater-style shoes have hook-and-loop straps on the canvas upper for a snug fit. A sturdy rubber outsole stands up to wear and tear. The allover Disney's Kermit the Frog graphics may be hard to spot from a distance, but your toddler won't be. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

title: Nizza Hi RF x André Saraiva Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
Feel the love. A collaboration with graffiti icon André Saraiva, these adidas Nizza sneakers transform a classic look into a message of affection for the Earth. See the stick-figure Mr. A smiling off the side? That's exactly what he stands for.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Crew Red / Wonder White / Wonder White

title: OZELIA Shoes
subtitle: Youth Originals
description:
The future awaits, but the past still leaves an impact. Both meet in this juniors' version of the classic adidas OZELIA Shoes. The silhouette stays true to the '90s origins while the dramatic weldings and 3D striping are fluid and forward-looking. Adiprene cushioning keeps you comfy all day.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
colors: Carbon / Carbon / Core Black

description: When worlds collide, magic happens. These adidas shoes are proof. They take vintage B-ball DNA and mix it with a classic design from the world of skate. Voila. Now it's a slip-on. Slide in and go. Anywhere. Anytime.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White

description: Whether you're building consistency, upping your distance or training for a personal best, Solarglide 5 are the shoes you leave by the door to support your goals every single day. They're packed with performance technology, from the BOOST midsole to the knit upper and the adidas LEP 2.0. This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean.
colors: Core Black / Grey Six / Carbon

description: The Boston Marathon is a race. But it's also a goal and a training plan during all the days it stays on your mind before the big one. The Adizero Boston 11 shoes are built for mid- to long-distance running. They bring a race-day quality to training, with a propulsive feel that comes from ENERGYRODS, which limit energy loss underfoot. They're fast, but that does not come at the cost of durability — the midsole mixes ultralight Lightstrike Pro cushioning with durable Lightstrike EVA.
colors: Grey Three / Zero Metalic / Carbon

description:
Add some subtle style to your casual outfits. The heel tab of these adidas tennis-inspired sneakers features an iridescent finish that will turn heads. The combination of ultra-soft Cloudfoam cushioning and a stabilizing cupsole provides comfort every step of your day.

This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

Casual style that's easy to get on and off. You'll want to wear these adidas shoes every day of the week. Inspired by classic running looks, these shoes have a bold adidas graphic on the midfoot band. A mesh upper adds breathability, and the Cloudfoam midsole is ultra comfortable.

This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.
colors: Carbon / Core Black / Chalk White

description:
Indoor, outdoor, whatever. Kids live for recess, no matter where it happens. So lace them into a pair of sneakers that have been helping soccer players speed down every surface from icy ground to artificial turf. The adidas Samba was first introduced in 1950. Since then, it's become one of the most popular futsal shoes of all time, and a streetwear icon to boot. This kids' version gives them their own little piece of the legend.

Made with vegan alternatives to animal-derived ingredients or materials.
colors: Cloud White / Core Black / Gum

description: Free your feet. These juniors' Adilette Lite Slides let your toes take in the sun. An extra-soft footbed cushions each step. An adidas Trefoil on top nods back to their sporty origins as a locker room slide for the '70s German soccer team.
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Core Black

description:
Slip on and go. These versatile running-inspired shoes are made to help you get out the door quickly. The elastic strap gives you a locked-down feel when you're moving at top speed. Soft Cloudfoam cushioning is for lasting comfort when you're on your feet for longer than expected. 

This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.
colors: Carbon / Core Black / Chalk White

description: For young B-ballers who love the sport, they can't get enough time on the court. From the school gym to the park to their own backyard hoop, kids can keep working on their game in all-day comfort with these adidas basketball shoes. They offer durable stability that lasts season after season.
colors: Core Black / Gold Metallic / Cloud White

description: A transitional style for your everyday activities. In the locker room or on the street, these sandals feature adjustable straps and an ultra-soft footbed for total comfort. The modern, sport-inspired design gives a clean look.

Life moves fast. So do they. Support toddlers' excitement for adventure with an easy-to-move-in pair of adidas shoes like these. Flexible cushioning adapts to the action, and the slip-on design is all about ease. And let's not forget about style. They'll look good everywhere from the playground to the grocery store.

Muted shades come through in a big way with the latest Ultraboost 1.0 DNA Shoes. Already known for its legendary status, the classic shoe steps things up this season with a fresh colorway that's designed to go the distance. From laid-back strolls around the city to catch ups with friends, these stylish, hazel-hued sneakers easily transition with you throughout the day. The iconic BOOST midsole and adidas PRIMEKNIT upper ensure comfort with every step and provides flexible support while you set a new style PB.
colors: Cloud White / Team Maroon / Team Colleg Gold

description: From the pool deck to the shower to the couch, these slides are made for the work-hard-rest-hard lifestyle. The slip-on construction gives you a snug fit that's easy to kick on and off as needed. Lightweight cushioning keeps your feet cradled in all-day comfort. The adidas logo and 3-Stripes design complete the iconic Adilette style.
colors: Royal Blue / Cloud White / Royal Blue

description: Swerve through crowds and cruise across sidewalks. These adidas Stan Smith shoes are built for city exploration. A style that's been effortlessly cool for 50 years and counting, they've been updated with a durable CORDURA® upper that holds up to the scuffs and scrapes of daily life. Just like the original, their simple aesthetic pairs well with every single thing on your calendar.
colors: Pantone / Cloud White / Core Black

description: It's time to retire those retro running shoes you've been wearing forever. These adidas shoes have the look of the past plus the comfort of a modern pair. Responsive BOOST cushioning can't be beat when you're spending long hours on your feet. The nubuck upper and leather lining make it clear these shoes are for fashion, not fitness.
colors: Frost Pink / Almost Pink / Ecru Tint

description:
ADIZERO ADIOS PRO 3 is the ultimate long-distance road racing shoe, for fast runners looking to take their performance to the next level and run after new records. The midsole consists of 2 layers of resilient Lightstrike Pro foam providing cushioning. With optimized ENERGYRODS 2.0 embedded in the midsole, the ADIZERO ADIOS PRO 3 is designed to give runners the optimal level of stiffness and energy return. The new lightweight upper provides specific support where athletes need it most, finished off with a Continental rubber outsole with traction to help take corners at a fast pace.
*60% of 2021 World Major Marathon wins were by athletes wearing Adizero Adios Pro 2.

As kids' LEGO® bricks creations get bigger, their play gets more adventurous. The good news is that these adidas shoes are there for the journey. They have a Cloudfoam midsole to help them run and climb in comfort. An eye-catching LEGO® tech print and a LEGO®-themed design on the 3-Stripes and heel complete the look.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Shock Blue / Off White / Core Black

description: Retro vibes meets modern proportions. With the adidas Retropy E5 Shoes, we used the famed Racing 1 as the design foundation to craft a silhouette filled with equal parts nostalgia, modernity and comfort. Plush BOOST cushioning returns energy with every step that you take, and the animal-print upper blends the past with the present.
colors: Frost Pink / Almost Pink / Ecru Tint

description: The adidas Forum launched in '84 and quickly took the basketball world by storm. Its slam dunk DNA is back for the streets of today and bolder than ever. Classic elements stay intact: the X-design and the luxurious leather upper. Now the shoes are elevated on a platform outsole that takes your style to the next level.
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Core Black

description: Wear them with socks. Wear them with shorts. Wear them whenever, wherever. A pair of adidas Adilette slides is always a good idea when you're aiming for comfort. Even if it's dreary out, a tie-dye print on the bandage upper keeps the good vibes going strong. Because it's never a bad time to dream of sunny days.
colors: Beam Orange / Cloud White / Gum

description: The Adilette has been a favorite of beachgoers and poolside loungers since 1972. An embossed adidas Badge of Sport print on the soft bandage upper gives this version of the iconic slides a sporty feel. The contoured footbed delivers the stability the slides are famous for.
colors: Core Black / Core White / Grey Six

description: A modern take on an adidas classic. These slides keep your feet wrapped in comfort while adding a bold style statement to any outfit. Pair them with tights and a workout tank top, for a cozy fit on the way to the pool or yoga studio, or with your favorite denim and crop top for an athletic-casual vibe. A 3-Stripes graphic over the top strap keeps your look rooted in sport.
colors: Signal Orange / Signal Orange / Vivid Berry

description:
Respect is earned. Damian Lillard made his name by showing up in the moments that matter the most, when everything is on the line. These signature shoes from adidas Basketball and Dame celebrate one of the game's best closers with Dame graphics and a colorful upper inspired by the first time he competed with and beat some of the best hoopers in the world. The outsole and Bounce Pro midsole are designed specifically for Dame's lethal combination of speed and precision.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g., cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
colors: Blue Rush / Pulse Mint / Solar Pink

description:
Do you like your style with a heavy dose of winning attitude? The adidas Top Ten RB shoes have it. Back in the day, they were reserved for only the very best players in basketball. Now you can wear the bold stance, smooth leather and sharp contrast colors out onto city streets.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
colors: Cloud White / Dark Blue / Night Marine

description: Hike. Scramble. Explore. Like the multi-tool of trail footwear, these adidas Terrex hiking shoes are your all-purpose adventure shoe. A GORE-TEX membrane seals out wet conditions while letting your feet breathe for extended comfort in wet or dry conditions. Their lightweight-yet-rugged build supports your feet with the stability and comfort to keep moving in rugged, uneven terrain. Through it all, a Continental™ Rubber outsole provides extraordinary grip on any surface, wet or dry.
colors: Core Black / Grey Three / Solar Red

description: Sip on some healthy fruit juice. Lace on these adidas platform shoes. Stride out your front door feeling good. What better way is there to start a day? Not only do these shoes give your style a lift, they also celebrate a plant-based lifestyle with vivid colors and fruits illustrated on the sockliner. Your new daily motto — "make it juicy" — is right there on the tongue label.

When kids are just discovering their favorite sports, they'll love these playful adidas shoes that feature Disney's Donald Duck on the side. They're made with Cloudfoam cushioning so they're super comfortable from the playground to the pitch. The elastic laces make them easy to pull on and off, and the hook-and-loop top strap ensures a stay-put fit.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Strike when your opponent least expects it. Drive to the rim, pull up from deep and leave defenders in your wake — just like James Harden. A Boost midsole provides the energy return you need, from the opening whistle to those grueling last seconds of overtime. Bands on the forefoot and heel give you a locked-down feel all game long.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White

description:
Respect is earned. Damian Lillard made his name by showing up in the moments that matter the most, when everything is on the line. These junior's signature shoes from adidas Basketball and Dame celebrate one of the game's best closers with Dame graphics and a colorful upper inspired by the first time he competed with and beat some of the best hoopers in the world. The outsole and Bounce Pro midsole are designed specifically for Dame's lethal combination of speed and precision.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g., cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

Slip 'em on for effortless style. These skateboard-inspired shoes have a sleek and classic silhouette for good times at your favorite hangouts. The adidas call-out on the tongue nods at your 3-Stripes pride. 

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White

description: In a constantly changing world, be part of the change for good. Join our mission to help end plastic waste by slipping on these adidas NMD_R1 shoes made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. All the signature staples of the NMDs are there — from the sock-like knit upper to the plush BOOST midsole and iconic heel plugs. You're not just doing good with these sneakers; you're feeling and looking good too.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Core Black

description:
These toddlers' adidas boots will inspire lots of different types of play with their fun LEGO® details. Made with a soft and Cozy lining, they'll keep your little one exploring even in chilly weather. The wide fit supports growing feet while the chunky outsole helps them plant each step with confidence.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Core Black / Eqt Yellow / Red

description: You don't need a lot to go running. A snack, a playlist and these adidas running shoes will keep you going for the next few miles. Cushioned and responsive, Pureboost is an ultra-comfortable training shoe for short daily runs. adidas BOOST delivers incredible energy return with each step, and the Stretchweb rubber outsole flexes underfoot for an energized ride.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Core Black

description:
For 50 years, the adidas Stan Smith Shoes have been a staple on the courts and on the streets. Their minimalist style is the very definition of effortless cool. But even icons have to change to stay rooted in the present, which is why this version of the trainers is created with recycled materials. It's part of our effort and commitment to help end plastic waste. 

This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.
colors: Supplier Colour / Cloud White / Gold Metallic

description:
Slow them down? Not a chance. Set your little one up to zoom around in comfort in these toddlers' adidas shoes. Rooted in running but designed for all-day play, they keep squirmy little feet comfortable with a supportive knit mesh upper and a cushioned EVA midsole. Oh, and they look good too. Win. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Core Black / Grey Five / Cloud White

description: Shoes for everyday wear, from the halls at school to gym class to running errands with you on the weekend. Whether your kid is new to the track team or just needs to move through the day with confidence, these adidas sneakers deliver. A lightweight feel provides comfort even on the longest days.
colors: Carbon / Cloud White / Impact Orange

description: Drawing inspiration from the adidas Basketball archives, these shoes are the intersection of sport and style. Iconic overlays bring old-school style to this updated look. A Cloudfoam insert offers lasting comfort, while a Geofit collar forms to your ankles to create your ideal fit.
colors: Cloud White / Royal Blue / Grey Two

description:
For kids who would always rather be in motion. Help them get ready for playtime at maximum speed with these adidas shoes. The shoes slip on easily and adjust quickly for a snug fit. Lightweight cushioning underfoot keeps them running and jumping comfortably all day long.

This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Carbon

description:
Whether you're headed out for a morning run or meeting up with friends for an evening out, keep your feet comfortable and your style on point in these adidas wide-fit shoes. A mesh upper helps you stay cool, while superlight cushioning cradles every step you take.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Grey Four / Vivid Red / Iron Metallic

description:
Whether you're headed out for a morning run or meeting up with friends for an evening out, keep your feet comfortable and your style on point in these adidas wide-fit shoes. A mesh upper helps you stay cool, while superlight cushioning cradles every step you take.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
